column4: Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller placed bet against Tesla during Q4
column5: NEW YORK Billionaire investor Stanley Druckenmiller bet against electric carmaker Tesla Inc during the fourth quarter  wagering that its share price will fall  according to quarterly filings released on Thursday.

column4: REFILE-Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller placed bet against Tesla during Q4
column5: NEW YORK  Feb 14 Billionaire investor Stanley Druckenmiller bet against electric carmaker Tesla Inc during the fourth quarter  wagering that its share price will fall  according to quarterly filings released on Thursday.

column4: Nvidia forecasts demand rebound  Wall Street not so sure
column5: Nvidia Corp's forecast of a demand rebound by the end of the year calmed investor nerves and pushed its shares up 5 percent on Friday  but several Wall Street analysts said the outlook was "aggressive" given weak demand and the ongoing U.S.-China trade war.

column4: Nvidia full-year sales outlook tops analyst views; shares rise
column5: Chip maker Nvidia Corp on Thursday forecast sales for its current fiscal year that topped Wall Street expectations  sending its shares up 8 percent in late trading.
